This repository contains the material from the talk _Exploring Varieties: A Practical Guide_ from [SIAM's Texas-Louisiana Section 2019 conference](http://faculty.smu.edu/sxu/SIAMTXLA19/index.html) [Session on Applications of Algebraic Geometry](https://sites.google.com/view/taylorbrysiewicz/service/siamtxla) organized by [Taylor Brysiewicz](https://sites.google.com/view/taylorbrysiewicz) and [Frank Sottile](https://www.math.tamu.edu/~frank.sottile/).
